short_summary: General contractor services for Grande Cache Institution.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
---

## Title and Reference Information

* Title (English/French): General Contractor Services for Grande Cache Institution / Services d’entrepreneur général pour l'Institution de Grande Cache
* Solicitation Number: WS4550535579
* Reference Number: WS4550535579-Doc4641298138
* Amendment Number: 1
* Date Published: June 19, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 11, 2024 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 31, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: TBC

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name (English/French): Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada
* End User Entity Name (English/French): Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) / Service correctionnel du Canada (SCC)
* Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9 Canada

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Sabieh Ullah
* Contact Email: sabieh.ullah@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20065496?extsite=MjAwNjU0OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a general contractor to provide general contracting services for the Grande Cache Institution. The bid for the tender is an open competitive process. The contractor must have experience in providing facility maintenance and repair services and demonstrate compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

For any queries regarding the tender, please contact Sabieh Ullah at the above email address and reference the solicitation number WS4550535579. Please find the link to the tender URL above.
